text: this was the first Pastor that Dad and I introduced rotating to introduce that into our operations that was kind of an eye-opener for my father because he was one of them old school you just turn them out they'll do their thing it took him a few years because I'd turn out the same time and my calves would always come home bigger because the weaning weights as far as rotational grazing is just phenomenal that's been a significant boost to our operation
